title: Large-Scale Creative Teaching Method Design and Implementation in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational methodologies and understanding of medical education systems
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service/in-service teachers to design and refine creative pedagogies applicable in medical education contexts using mixed research methods

learning_goals: Systematically analyze creative teaching methods in medical education settings using mixed research methods (quantitative+qualitative)
Design improvement strategies for software (human/institutional elements) and hardware (physical/technical elements) to promote learner engagement
Develop a mixed research design document to evaluate the effectiveness of creative teaching methods

resources: Case Study Materials (Medical Education Success Cases)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
